name: d3-gridding
description: Grids for rapid d3 charts mock-ups

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -c rollup.config.js -f umd -g d3-array:d3,d3-shape:d3,d3-scale:d3,d3-hierarchy:d3 -n d3 -o build/d3-gridding.js -- index.js
scripts.test: tape -r esm 'test/**/*-test.js' && eslint index.js src test
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-gridding.js -c -m -o build/d3-gridding.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-gridding.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-gridding.js build/d3-gridding.min.js
